stories.title: Initialize Next.js 16 project with core dependencies
stories.description: Bootstrap the Tempo focus timer app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, and SQLite database setup using better-sqlite3.
acceptance: Next.js 16 app created with App Router and TypeScript using `bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes`
Biome configured for linting and formatting using `cd app && bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx @biomejs/biome init` (replaces ESLint)
Tailwind CSS v4 configured with CSS-first configuration
shadcn/ui initialized with bunx shadcn@latest init using neutral base color
better-sqlite3 installed and database connection utility created at lib/db.ts
SQLite schema created with sessions table (id, duration, completed_at, type)
Project runs successfully with bun dev on localhost:3000
Light/dark mode configured via next-themes respecting prefers-color-scheme

stories.title: Create typographic timer display component
stories.description: Build the central timer display with dynamic viewport-sized typography that scales beautifully across all screen sizes.
acceptance: Timer component renders mm:ss format centered on screen
Typography uses clamp() with viewport units (e.g., clamp(4rem, 20vw, 12rem))
Font uses system UI stack with tabular-nums for stable digit widths
Timer digits animate smoothly on change with subtle scale/opacity transition
Minimal borderless design with generous whitespace (10vh+ padding)
Fully responsive from 320px mobile to desktop without breakpoints
Dark mode inverts colors elegantly with smooth transition

stories.title: Implement pomodoro timer logic with state management
stories.description: Build the core timer engine supporting pomodoro technique with work/break intervals and pause/resume functionality.
acceptance: Timer counts down from configurable duration (default 25 min work, 5 min break)
Start/pause toggle via tap anywhere on timer or spacebar
Timer state persists across page refreshes using localStorage
Visual indicator distinguishes work vs break sessions (subtle color shift)
Timer automatically transitions from work to break and vice versa
Skip button allows jumping to next session type
useReducer or zustand manages timer state cleanly

stories.title: Add satisfying session completion animations
stories.description: Create delightful micro-interactions when timer completes including haptic feedback, visual celebration, and audio cue.
acceptance: Completion triggers subtle confetti or particle burst animation
Screen gently pulses or flashes on completion
Browser notification fires if permission granted
Optional haptic feedback on mobile via navigator.vibrate
Soft chime sound plays (can be muted in settings)
Animation respects prefers-reduced-motion media query
Completion state shows brief success message before auto-transitioning

stories.title: Build session history with SQLite persistence
stories.description: Track completed focus sessions in SQLite database and display a minimal history view with daily/weekly statistics.
acceptance: Completed sessions saved to SQLite via API route POST /api/sessions
History view accessible via swipe-up gesture or bottom drawer
Displays today's completed sessions with timestamps
Shows streak counter (consecutive days with 1+ session)
Weekly summary shows total focus time in hours/minutes
History items use whimsical hierarchy (large time, small date)
Swipe-to-dismiss individual history items with delete confirmation

stories.title: Implement ambient sound mixer for focus enhancement
stories.description: Add a selection of ambient sounds (rain, coffee shop, white noise) that users can mix and play during focus sessions.
acceptance: Sound picker accessible via subtle icon tap in corner
Minimum 4 ambient options: rain, cafe, fire crackling, white noise
Audio loops seamlessly using Web Audio API or HTMLAudioElement
Individual volume sliders for each active sound
Sounds auto-pause when timer pauses, resume when timer resumes
Sound preferences persist in localStorage
Master volume control with elegant slider design

stories.title: Create settings panel with gesture navigation
stories.description: Build a slide-in settings panel for customizing timer durations, sounds, and appearance preferences.
acceptance: Settings accessible via swipe-left or gear icon tap
Work duration configurable: 15, 20, 25, 30, 45, 60 minutes
Break duration configurable: 5, 10, 15, 20 minutes
Long break option after 4 pomodoros (configurable)
Sound toggle on/off for completion chime
Settings persist to localStorage
Panel slides in from right with backdrop blur effect
Close via swipe-right, backdrop tap, or X button

stories.title: Implement touch gestures and keyboard shortcuts
stories.description: Add intuitive swipe gestures for mobile and keyboard shortcuts for desktop power users.
acceptance: Tap anywhere on timer toggles play/pause
Swipe up reveals session history drawer
Swipe left opens settings panel
Swipe right from edge goes back/closes panels
Spacebar toggles play/pause on desktop
R key resets current timer
S key skips to next session
Escape closes any open panel
Gestures use touch-action CSS for smooth 60fps interactions
